column4: anyone who uses deluge here; my deluge just lost all it's torrents
how can i retreive them back
are they partly downloaded or completely downloaded?
no i meant my deluge is completely empty now
okay, then just re add the .torrent files
if the files are still there deluge will start where it left of
its where you requested the file be saved
yes, re-enter the .torrent files and it will be fine
in deluge go to Edit > Preferences, where does it say it stores your torrent files?
it doesnt copy the torrent files
it didnt save the torrent files; because it wasnt checked on
well then you need to redownload the torrent files
